News.Title: Williamson Magor Board Changes: Two Directors Resign
News.Summary: Williamson Magor & Co. Limited announces resignation of two Non-Executive & Non-Independent Directors Mrs. Sonali Datta Sarkar and Mr Amit Dey effective January 28, 2026 due to personal commitments.

News.Title: Williamson Magor Appoints Two Additional Directors
News.Summary: Williamson Magor & Co. Limited appointed Mr. Dilip Kumar Parida and Mr. Javed Hossain as Additional Directors (Non-Executive & Non-Independent) effective January 28, 2026.

News.Title: NCLT Dismisses Insolvency Petition Against Williamson Magor & Co. Limited
News.Summary: The National Company Law Tribunal Kolkata dismissed Vishnu Infracomplex Private Limited's application to initiate Corporate Insolvency Resolution Process against Williamson Magor & Co. Limited over Rs. 2.72 crore debt claim. The tribunal ruled that the financial creditor failed to issue mandatory notice as required under their settlement agreement dated November 10, 2021, before seeking legal remedies.

News.Title: Williamson Magor Co. Reports Quarterly Loss Amid Financial Distress and NBFC License Issues
News.Summary: Williamson Magor Co. Limited reported a net loss of Rs. 30.9 crore for the quarter ended September 30, 2025, with auditors expressing qualified concerns over the company's going concern assumption due to fully eroded net worth. The company continues to face challenges including cancelled NBFC registration by RBI, defaults on loan repayments, and disputes with secured lenders including HDFC Bank Limited.

News.Title: Williamson Magor & Co. Schedules Board Meeting for November 13 to Approve Quarterly Results
News.Summary: Williamson Magor & Co. Limited has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on November 13, 2025, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2025. The company has notified BSE, NSE, and Calcutta Stock Exchange about the scheduled meeting. The trading window for designated persons and their immediate relatives will remain closed until 48 hours after the declaration of the financial results to the stock exchanges.

News.Title: Williamson Magor & Co. Approves Multiple Director Appointments and 5-Year Secretarial Audit Contract at 74th AGM
News.Summary: Williamson Magor & Co. Limited held its 74th Annual General Meeting on September 24, 2025, where shareholders approved several key appointments. Mrs. Lopamudra Chatterjee was re-appointed as Director after retiring by rotation. Three new directors were appointed: Mr. Amit Dey and Mrs. Sonali Datta Sarkar as Non-Executive & Non-Independent Directors, and Mr. Tabrez Ahmed as an Independent Director for a 5-year term. The company also appointed M/s MKB & Associates as Secretarial Auditors for 5 consecutive years starting April 1, 2025. All appointed directors have extensive experience ranging from 20-30 years in their respective fields including finance, accounts, human resources, and administration. None of the new appointees are related to existing directors or key management personnel.

News.Title: Williamson Magor Approves Quarterly Results, Appoints New Directors and Secretarial Auditor
News.Summary: Williamson Magor & Co. Limited's Board of Directors approved unaudited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. The company reported a profit after tax of Rs. 17,683 thousand for the quarter compared to a loss of Rs. 20,69,043 thousand in the same period last year. The Board recommended the appointment of M/s MKB & Associates as secretarial auditor for five consecutive years starting April 1, 2025, subject to shareholder approval. Two new directors were appointed: Mrs. Sonali Datta Sarkar as Additional Director (Non-Executive & Non-Independent) and Mr. Tabrez Ahmed as Additional Director (Non-Executive Independent), both effective August 13, 2025. The company continues to face significant financial challenges including fully eroded net worth, disputes with secured lenders HDFC Bank Limited and InCred Financial Services Limited, and cancelled NBFC registration by RBI. The auditors issued a qualified review report citing material uncertainty about the company's ability to continue as a going concern and non-recognition of interest expenses on borrowings.

News.Title: Williamson Magor & Co. Schedules Board Meeting on August 13, 2025 for Quarterly Results
News.Summary: Williamson Magor & Co. Limited has scheduled a Board of Directors meeting for August 13, 2025, to consider and approve the unaudited financial results (standalone and consolidated) for the quarter ended June 30, 2025. The company announced that the trading window for designated persons, their immediate relatives, and other concerned parties will remain closed until 48 hours after the declaration of the results to stock exchanges. The communication was signed by Company Secretary Sk Javed Akhtar and sent to BSE, NSE, and Calcutta Stock Exchange.

News.Title: Debasish Lahiri Resigns as Non-Executive Director of Williamson Magor & Co.
News.Summary: Debasish Lahiri has resigned from his position as Non-Executive Director of Williamson Magor & Co. Limited, effective July 29, 2025. The resignation was attributed to increasing personal commitments. The company disclosed this information to stock exchanges including BSE, NSE, and Calcutta Stock Exchange in compliance with regulatory requirements.
